title: Index of min element
description: In this lab, you will learn how to find the index of the minimum element in a list using the built-in `min()` function and the `list.index()` method in Python.

meta.title: Find the Index of the Minimum Element in a List
meta.description: Learn how to write a Python function that returns the index of the element with the minimum value in a list.

verify.name: Verify Minimum Element Index
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: Índice del elemento mínimo
i18n.description: En este laboratorio, aprenderás a encontrar el índice del elemento mínimo en una lista utilizando la función integrada `min()` y el método `list.index()` en Python.
